name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: An intern opened up an envelope containing white powder, but it turned out to be harmless. It was a shame, because I think we have too many interns.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: The anthrax scare makes me long for the good old days, when the only thing we had to worry about was the Bubonic Plague.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Prince Charles adopted a puppy. He has floppy ears and a big snout — and I don’t know what the puppy is like.
